descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/5083650-1360156467.jpg[/img]

Well since you can't fight underwater, mere'swell slap bandits around the face with a fish.

Hello, we meet again for the first time it seems. From the deepest depths of the deepest carverns of the deepest reccesses of the machinations of my mind I 'hooked' this. A Slaughterfish for a weapon!. What once was the scorn of the oceans and rivers of Nirn is now nothing more than a Fishy Stick. Yes nobody has thought of it, nobody wants it but behold the Fish Slapper.

Onto what it actually does. This mod adds a weildable Slaughterfish for a weapon, it's classed as a mace and it can be tempered with Slaughterfish Scales. But it cannot be forged as all you'll end up with is a nice smokey fish dinner and not a wet fish to slap people with.

There's about 4 scattered around.
In the sunken Nord ruin in the middle of lake Ilinalta in a bowl.
In Boulderfall Cave on the table.
In Purewater Ruin near the Dwemer head underwater.
Outside the Abandoned Shack on a crate.
And if you're really lazy, on the enchanted table in the Qasmoke cell.

The mesh doesn't have any blood maps as I haven't yet discovered how to do them and it looks better slapping people with an unbloodied fish also the fins might go through the hand grip but it's difficult to change that. It's weaker than the Iron mace but if you keep at it you can slap them into submission.

Right That's your lot.
Stay Muddy.
author: MudcrabKing
